ladies and gentlemen, in the move to
limit immigration starting this year, the
British government officially prohibits
international undergraduate students from bringing relatives to
this country according to the Ministry of Internal Affairs.
Only postgraduate programs or scholarships sponsored by the country's government are allowed to apply for visas for relatives. In
addition, international students cannot
convert their student visa to a
work visa until they graduate.
one of the British government's efforts
to limit immigration into the
country. However, many experts believe
that the new policy will have a major impact
on universities that depend on
foreign student tuition fees as well as  like

a series of earthquakes that hit
central Japan on the first day of the year
have made many public opinions concerned about the
safety of the shika nuclear power plant.
Hokuriku Electric Power Company, the
operator of the Shika plant, said the
Shika nuclear power plant in Ishikawa prefecture has been shut down
since the 2011 Fukushima disaster.
There were several power outages and
oil leaks, but there were no
projectile leaks. Hoku Riku Electric Power Company has been
actively working to restart the
plant. However, recent earthquakes and
earthquakes have raised concerns.
Local residents were concerned about the safety
of the plant once it resumed operations after an
earthquake as strong as 7.6 E
shook Ishikawa Prefecture and surrounding areas,
killing 84 people and dozens of people.
Another person was missing as of the evening of January 4.
American researchers have created the
first applicable semiconductor from
raffin instead of silicon. This step is
expected to open a new era for the
electronics industry with  smaller devices are
faster and
more efficient professor w the here at
jia medtech is the head of a
research team that has created semiconductors from
rapin like which is made of
carbon atoms bonded to
raffin's advantage is that
not only does it make things smaller,
faster, and dissipate less heat, it also possesses
electron characteristics that silicon does not
have in its natural form. raffin is not a
semiconductor.  However, when rapin is
produced on
highly pure cic plates it exhibits the characteristics
of a semiconductor. Tests
show that the resulting semiconductor has a higher degree of mobility
than this would imply.  is that
electrons move faster, thereby
helping computers operate faster.
Professor The said that raffin semiconductors are the
next step. And it could become the
main material for electronic devices
in the next 50 years.
The 2024 International Ice Lantern Festival
is taking place in New American Fish City,
Heilongjiang Province, China.
This annual festival is always a
popular destination for many people and visitors
at the beginning of the new year.  The
space of the Harbin Ice Festival is
up to 810,000 cubic meters wide and during the
tourist season this place lights up the entire
sky with 250,000 cubic meters of ice creating
thousands of architectural blocks including
castles and sculptures.
Uniquely themed ice carvings to welcome
visitors, artisans have turned
this tourist event into a Sleepless Festival by hanging
an artificial moon floating in the
sky along with unique flower displays
throughout the world.  The festival landscape becomes
more magical, making viewers feel like they are lost
in a shimmering, colorful fairy tale world.
Besides, the presence of
cute animals such as tigers,
penguins, and bears also attracts visitors.
During the recent Lunar New Year holiday,
Harbin city welcomed a
record number of visitors of more than 3 million
people, helping to earn more than 5.9 billion yuan,
equivalent to about 800 million

An endangered baby gorilla
was just born at the zoo in the Republic's capital, Prague,
so the zoo temporarily closed the
Gorilla complex to facilitate  The
gorilla mother and child were able to
rest very well. Visitors were excited
to see this baby monkey when the zoo reopened
yesterday. The zoo's board of directors said the
baby monkey was born on the evening of the 2nd.
last month is the child of the mother duni monkey of
the western lowland gorilla species. Currently,
they have not been able to determine the sex of
the baby monkey, primate expert
at the Prague Zoo. Tells about the
birth of the baby gorilla  This is an
important event in the context of this species
being in danger of extinction. They live
according to a social structure. The young animals
need to be able to communicate with
other animals in their social group.
very important and
encouraged. We hope to be able to transfer
this baby monkey to another animal shelter so that it
has the opportunity to interact with others. There is still
plenty of time for people and tourists
in Prague to visit. Good luck baby monkey.  This is because
it will not be necessary to join society until it is three years old.
Western lowland macaques, which
grow in Central Africa,
were put on the list of
critically endangered animals by experts in
2007 due to the environment.  lives ravaged by
